name: com.getfilta.artist-unityplug
author: Filta
description: A suite of tools to help artists create face filters in Unity. Check www.getfilta.com for more information.

releaseLogs.releaseNotes:
- Body tracking fixes 
- Occlusion fixes
- fix: objects parented to the Faces object aren't automatically turned to face meshes.

- fix: vertex indices not in proper positions on windows platform
- fix: pressing f on trackers zooms in properly
- feat: add warning when artists leave objects out of Filter object

- new artist panel UX/UI
- minor quality of life fixes
- feat: better release notes.

- fix: bug of not being able to upload when you have objects outside of Filter object
- visual: move filter queue to uploader panel

- fix: meshes with blendshapes are now handled properly
- visual: new simulator video

- feat: add loading default filter editor layout
- visual: new simulator video with blink
- add logo to artist panel

- feat: add realtime testing of filter with separate ArRemote app
 feat: change login method to remote-login
- feat: add filta event triggers to visual scripting. event triggers include events that are triggered by mouth, left eye and right eye movements.
- feat: upgraded realtime testing of filter. now has better quality and shows filter on both editor and app. fix: status bar correctly shows when filter is done processing
- feat: add hotkeys. fix: many small bugs
- feat: auto-refresh filter queue.
- fix: post processing not working on artist remote.
- feat: add switching between face and body filter and also add face + body filter
- fix: small bugs

- feat: add filter size window for easy checking of filter size and big files.
 fix: small bugs

- feat: add artist remote support for body tracking
 fix: bugs and issues

- feat: add new LitFakeReflection shader under the Filta shader menu
 fix: setting default layout properly sets game resolution
- feat: change face meshes to be skinned mesh renderers to allow them be piped into vfx graph

- feat: create camera feed texture
- feat: create body segmentation texture
- feat: create face texture 
- feat: create shaders that can be used for body replacement or background replacement.
- feat: handle touch input from artist remote
- other small fixes
- feat: change name of faces object to faceMeshes to avoid ux issues.

- feat: improve face texture
- make main camera a part of the simulator object

- fix: video feed wrongly scaled on different game views.
- fix: null reference error with smrs that have no mesh
- feat: default dynamic lighting is now toggleable. feat: better in-editor shadow resolution
- feat: switch plugin to npm instead of git
